      Methods in de.sub.goobi.metadaten.copier with parameters of type CopierData 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract void DataCopyrule.apply(CopierData data)
      When called, the rule must be applied to the given fileformat.
      void OverwriteOrCreateRule.apply(CopierData data)
      Applies the rule to the given data object.
      void ComposeFormattedRule.apply(CopierData data)
      Applies the rule to the given data object.
      void CopyIfMetadataIsAbsentRule.apply(CopierData data)
      This method actually applies the rule to the given fileformat.
      protected void MetadataPathSelector.createIfPathExistsOnly(CopierData data, ugh.dl.DocStruct logicalNode, String value)
      Creates a metadatum with the given value if the full path is applied and no such metadatum is already available under at the path.
      protected abstract void MetadataSelector.createIfPathExistsOnly(CopierData data, ugh.dl.DocStruct logicalNode, String value)
      Calling createIfPathExistsOnly() on the implementing instance should check if the document structure node the metadata selector is pointing at is available, but no metadata as named by the path is available at that document structure node, and only in this case add a metadata as named by the path with the value passed to the function.
      protected void LocalMetadataSelector.createIfPathExistsOnly(CopierData data, ugh.dl.DocStruct logicalNode, String value)
      Checks if no metadata as named by the path is available at that document structure node, and only in this case adds a metadata as named by the path with the value passed to the function.
      void MetadataSelector.createIfPathExistsOnly(CopierData data, String value)
      Checks if the document structure node the metadata selector is pointing at is available, but no metadata as named by the path is available at that document structure node, and only in this case adds a metadata as named by the path with the value passed to the function.
      protected void MetadataPathSelector.createOrOverwrite(CopierData data, ugh.dl.DocStruct logicalNode, String value)
      Sets the metadatum identified by the given path if available, otherwise creates the path and metadatum.
      protected abstract void MetadataSelector.createOrOverwrite(CopierData data, ugh.dl.DocStruct logicalNode, String value)
      Calling createOrOverwrite() on the implementing instance should check if the document structure node as named by the path is available, and set the metadata as named by the path to the value passed to the function.
      protected void LocalMetadataSelector.createOrOverwrite(CopierData data, ugh.dl.DocStruct logicalNode, String value)
      Sets the value of the metadata described by the path to the value passed to the function or creates a metadata as described by the path, respectively.
      void MetadataSelector.createOrOverwrite(CopierData data, String value)
      Checks if the document structure node as named by the path is available, and sets the metadata as named by the path to the value passed to the function.
      Iterable<MetadataSelector> MetadataSelector.findAll(CopierData data)
      Returns all concrete metadata selectors the potentially generic metadata selector expression resolves to.
      abstract String DataSelector.findIn(CopierData data)
      Calling findIn() on the implementing instance should return the value of the metadata named by the path used to construct the metadata selector.
      String StringSelector.findIn(CopierData data)
      Returns the value of the string used to create the selector.
      String MetadataSelector.findIn(CopierData data)
      Returns the value of the metadata named by the path used to construct the metadata selector, or null if either the path or the metadata at the end of the path aren’t available.
      String VariableSelector.findIn(CopierData data)
      Returns the value of the variable named by the path used to construct the variable selector.
      String DestinationReferenceSelector.findIn(CopierData data)
      Returns the document structure level indicated by the index form the respective destination path.
      void DataCopier.process(CopierData data)
      Applies the rules defined by the “program” passed to the constructor onto a given dataset.
